title: Shadow Dye
summaries: Shadow Dye is a type of dye bought from the Dye Trader during a full moon, or given as a possible reward for turning in a Strange Plant. When applied, it will darken the color of an item to almost pure black. Shadow Dye also leaves black colored particles while moving.

statistics.Buy: 3 GC75 SC
statistics.Sell: 75 SC
